title: Keep Disconnecting In-Game
body: Once every few games,  I would keep disconnecting and it would not reconnect unless I exit out of the game and reload it.

replies.body:
- Powercycle your modem (if possible)
- Connect to ethernet (if possible/applicable)
- Repair your client (settings gear in top right)
- Check your ISP status (google "[your ISP] service status")
- Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
